attributes.comment:
I am writing to you because we would like to voice our opinion regarding the
increase in the fees that will affect adoptive parents. We understand that
adjustment need to be made but as it is to adopt internationally a child is so
difficult and expensive that an increase in fees could affect families that are trying
to fullfill their dreams of becoming parents. The dreams of raising new citizens to
our society that in the future will be the leaders and wil be part of the work force of
our great nation. By adopting these children we are providing a better life for them
in the best country of the world. Where we have freedom of speech, freedom to
work and limitless opportunity for growth financially and professionally. Because
we are realistic, we just want to request that you listen to our plea for a lower
increase.
Thank you for your time and attention.
Sincerely;
Vivian A. Santiago-Pagan

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Vivian A. Santiago-Pagan
